import { memo, useState, useContext } from 'react' import './ProfileLayout.scss' import EditProfileIcon from '../../images/editUser.png' import HistoryBookingIcon from '../../images/bookingHistory.png' import Avatar1 from '../../images/avatar1.png' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/ProfileLayout' function ProfileLayout({ languageSelected, children }) { const [avatar, setAvatar] = useState() const menu = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese return (
{menu.txtClickChangeImage}
{children}
) } export default memo(ProfileLayout)
